work.title: Growth: Notifications
work.description: Under the IG Growth org, I worked on developing notifications around Story Highlights and Direct Inbox to drive user growth. Using Django, I created a data pipeline to pull eligible users and notify them of certain events. I conducted A/B testing to measure MAP gain and minimize reachability loss.

work.title: Credit Experiences
work.description: Collections are common, high-impact debts that severely drops a userâ€™s credit score. To address this, I created a new experience in Scala, React, and GraphQL to notify users of their collections and how to resolve them. I also built a contextual backlinking framework by passing location states within page queries.
